member.name: T:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project
member.summary: Represents a Visual Studio c# project file.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the project file from the specified path.
member.param: The path to the project file.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.GetConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the configuration with the specified name.
member.param: A valid configuration name, usually "Debug" or "Release".

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.GetRelativeOutputPathForConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the relative path (from the solution directory) to the assembly this project generates.
member.param: A valid configuration name, usually "Debug" or "Release".

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.GetRelativePathToDocumentationFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the relative path (from the solution directory) to the XML documentation this project generates.
member.param: A valid configuration name, usually "Debug" or "Release".

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.Solution
member.summary: Gets the solution that contains this project.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.RelativePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative path (from the solution directory) to the project directory.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.ID
member.summary: Gets the GUID that identifies the project.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the project.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.ProjectType
member.summary: Gets a string that represents the type of project.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets the name of the assembly this project generates.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.OutputType
member.summary: Gets the output type of the project.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.OutputFile
member.summary: Gets the filename of the generated assembly.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Project.RootNamespace
member.summary: Gets the default namespace for the project.

member.name: T:NDoc.VisualStudio.ProjectConfig
member.summary: ProjectConfig settings for Visual Studio C# projects.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.ProjectConfig.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the configuration.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.ProjectConfig.OutputPath
member.summary: Gets the location of the output files (relative to the project directory) for this project's configuration.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.ProjectConfig.DocumentationFile
member.summary: Gets the name of the file (relative to the project directory) into which documentation comments will be processed.

member.name: T:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution
member.summary: Represents a Visual Studio solution file.
member.remarks: This class is used to read a Visual Studio solution file

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Solution class.
member.param: The Visual Studio solution file to parse.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a .sln file.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.GetProjectConfigName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the specified project's configuration name based for a specific solution configuration.
member.param: A valid configuration name for the solution.
member.returns: The project configuration name or null.
member.remarks: The null value is returned when the parameters are invalid, or if the project is not marked to be built under the specified solution configuration.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.GetConfigurations
member.summary: Get the solution's configurations.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.GetProject(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the project with the specified GUID.
member.param: The GUID used to identify the project in the .sln file.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.GetProject(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the project with the specified name.

member.name: M:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.GetProjects
member.summary: Allows you to enumerate (using foreach) over the solution's projects.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.Directory
member.summary: Gets the SolutionDirectory property.
member.remarks: This is the directory that contains the VS.NET solution file.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.Name
member.summary: Gets the SolutionName property.
member.remarks: This is the name of the VS.NET solution file without the .sln extension.

member.name: P:NDoc.VisualStudio.Solution.ProjectCount
member.summary: Gets a count of the number of projects in the solution
